protocol.name: P-GSE27669-3
protocol.text: Arabidopsis seeds were sterilized and stratified in water for 3 d at 4 ºC, germinated on 1X Murashige Skoog (MS) agar medium (0.43% [w/v] MS salts, pH 5.75) additionally containing 1% (w/v) sucrose in vertically oriented plates in a growth chamber (23 ºC, 16 h light/ 8 h dark, 125 uE m-2 s-1), and after 7 d of growth they were collected at midday, frozen in liquid nitrogen, and stored at -80C until further processing.

protocol.name: P-GSE27669-4
protocol.text: Total RNA extraction was performed using TRIzol reagent (Invitrogen), followed by further purification on RNeasy columns (Qiagen). RNA integrity was assessed by electrophoresis with a 2100 Bioanalyzer (Agilent).

protocol.name: P-GSE27669-5
protocol.text: Intact RNA (100 ng) was labeled using the GeneChip 3' IVT Express kit.

protocol.name: P-GSE27669-6
protocol.text: Hybridization to ATH1 GeneChips was performed following the manufacturer’s method (Affymetrix) at the Genomics Core Facility, University of California, Riverside.

protocol.name: P-GSE27669-7
protocol.text: Arrays were scanned using the ScanArray Express (Perkin-Elmer).

protocol.name: P-GSE27669-8
protocol.text: Data was analyzed from CEL files using Robin (RMA model) (Lohse et al., 2010 [PMID 20388663]).
